dt: {bc}an assembly or meeting for consultation, advice, or discussion
{bc}a group elected or appointed as an advisory or legislative body
{bc}an executive body whose members are equal in power and authority
{bc}a governing body of delegates from local units of a federation
{bc}a federation of or a central body uniting a group of organizations

dt.t: the National {it}Council{/it} of Teachers of English

et: Middle English {it}counceil{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}cunseil, cuncile{/it}, from Latin {it}concilium{/it}, from {it}com-{/it} + {it}calare{/it} to call {ma}{mat|low:3|}{/ma}
shortdef: an assembly or meeting for consultation, advice, or discussion
a group elected or appointed as an advisory or legislative body
the legislative body of a city

dt: {bc}a council constituted to advise or share in the functions of a political executive
{bc}a council that exercises supreme executive power

shortdef: a council constituted to advise or share in the functions of a political executive
a council that exercises supreme executive power

dt: {bc}a permanent committee chosen from both houses that meets between sessions of a state legislature to study state problems and plan a legislative program
{bc}a unicameral legislature (as in a British colony)
{bc}the upper house of a British bicameral legislature

shortdef: a permanent committee chosen from both houses that meets between sessions of a state legislature to study state problems and plan a legislative program
a unicameral legislature (as in a British colony)
the upper house of a British bicameral legislature

dt: {bc}a body of officials and dignitaries chosen by the British monarch as an advisory council to the Crown usually functioning through its committees
{bc}a usually appointive advisory council to an executive

shortdef: a body of officials and dignitaries chosen by the British monarch as an advisory council to the Crown usually functioning through its committees
a usually appointive advisory council to an executive

dt: {bc}a permanent council of the United Nations with primary responsibility for maintaining peace and security

shortdef: a permanent council of the United Nations with primary responsibility for maintaining peace and security
